content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Helm Chart 3.1.6 August 27, 2025 — The Helm Chart 3.1.6 release includes the following: Enhancements This release enhances the Workload Operator component to be idempotent.
